landing_page.title: Spend crypto without leaving your position.
landing_page.subtitle: Leverage your crypto assets to generate Dai, a decentralized cryptocurrency pegged at the value of 1 US dollar.

cdp_create.select_text: Each collateral type has its own risk parameters. You can lock up additional collateral types later.
cdp_create.setup_proxy_proxy_text: Proxies are used in the CDP Portal to bundle multiple transactions into one, saving transaction time and gas costs. This only has to be done once.
cdp_create.setup_proxy_allowance_text: This permission allows Maker smart contracts to interact with your {0}. This has to be done once for each new collateral type.
cdp_create.deposit_text: Different collateral types have different risk parameters and collateralization ratios.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field1_title: How much {0} would you like to lock in your CDP?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field1_text: The amount of {0} you lock up determines how much Dai you can generate.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field2_title: What target collateralization ratio would you like to stay above?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field2_text: If your cdp drops below this target it will be considered {0} risk.
cdp_create.deposit_form_field3_title: How much DAI would you like to generate?
cdp_create.deposit_form_field3_text: You should generate an amount that is safely above the liquidation ratio.
cdp_create.confirmed_text: The estimated time is {0}. You can safely leave this page.
cdp_create.proxy_text: Before creating your first CDP, you must create a personal proxy contract.
cdp_create.stability_fee_description: The fee calculated on top of the existing debt of the CDP. This is paid when paying back DAI.
cdp_create.liquidation_ratio_description: The collateral-to-dai ratio at which a CDP becomes vulnerable to liquidation.
cdp_create.liquidation_penalty_description: The fee that is added to the total outstanding DAI debt when a liquidation occurs.
cdp_create.waiting_for_confirmations_info: Waiting for confirmations reduces the risk of your Maker Collateral Vault address changing. We require users to wait 10 block confirmations to ensure it has created successfully. This will often take around 2 minutes.
cdp_create.proxy_failure_not_mined: This transaction is taking longer than usual...
cdp_create.proxy_failure_not_mined_info: Transactions to the network may sometimes take longer than expected. This can be for a variety of reasons but may be due to a congested network or a transaction sent with a low gas price. Some wallets enable users to resend a transaction with a higher gas price, otherwise check for your transaction on etherscan and come back again later

cdp_migrate.select_text: Select a CDP and pay back the stability fee in DAI or MKR to migrate it to Multi-collateral Dai and the new CDP Portal.
cdp_migrate.trust_site_with_dai: Trust this site with my DAI
cdp_migrate.migrate_in_progress_text: The estimated time is 8 minutes. You can safely leave this page and return.
cdp_migrate.migrate_complete_text: CDP #{0} has been successfully migrated to Multi-collateral Dai and the new CDP Portal.

save.description: Receive interest on your Dai. Withdraw or top-up at any time.
